title: BEST JUNGLER IN 6300P
body:
ANY SUGGESTION ABOUT BEST CHAMP IN 6300P,WHICH CAN ONE SHOT AND DO JUNGLING?
              PLZ... SUGGEST OTHER THEN RENGAR!!!

replies.body:
There is no "best" champion for anything.

Some burst junglers are (in no particular order):

Shaco
Nidalee (somewhat)
Kha'Zix
Diana
Evelynn (somewhat)
Elise (somewhat)
Rengar
You forgot {{champion:254}}
Vi doesn't have instantaneous burst without being incredibly fed.
Q into AA inro E is pretty much instant, specially with animation cancel coming out of her Q.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wwkiuUZQ,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2016-09-30T16:43:32.266+0000)
>
> Vi doesn't have instantaneous burst without being incredibly fed.

Full damage Vi does. Her secondary classification is Assassin.
{{champion:107}}
OTHER THEN RENGAR............

hmmm....

{{champion:107}} maybe?
ALREADY MASTERED HIM..........
the only other champ i can rec you is {{champion:107}}.
HEHEHE... HOW MANY TIMES I TELL U ,, I ALREADY MASTERED RENGAR

did you already try out {{champion:107}}?

he perfectly fits your description.
YEAH........ I GOT LVL6 ON IT!!!!!!!
how 'bout {{champion:107}}?
ARE U MAD OR SOMETHING?... I JUST SAD I ALREADY USED IT

then you should totally try out {{champion:107}}!

i think you will like him.
U REALLY SUCKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!! U ARE TOTALLY A NUTTTT!!!!
I'm surprised no one has recommended {{champion:107}} yet...he perfectly matches your criteria :)
maybe {{champion:107}} ?
idk man, {{champion:107}} seems to be the best option of them all
Dont forget {{champion:119}} since this IS the League of Draven.

First of all the cost of a champion has absolutely NOTHING to do with their power.
Secondly there is no "best" jungle.
Thirdly, champions don't "ONE SHOT" unless so unbelievably fed that the enemy team is laughably under fed as a result of dying a lot. Even a fed Tryndamere needs 2 shots to kill most enemies. They utilize combos with their abilities to kill enemies quickly.

Now, do you even know what jungling is? Because I don't think you do. Anyone who knows anything about jungling would ask about clear times before asking about how to cheeseball an enemy.

While there isnt a best, my ~~bias~~ opinion for a very good jungler, is Elise! ( {{champion:60}} ) While not the easiest jungler, she has good sustain in the jungle, she doesnt take very much damage in first clear(Can use spiderlings to tank, and it isnt a hard thing to do.) She can gank pre 6, and her ganks when done right usually results in a kill. She has many build paths, ranging from Full AP, to Full tank, to a mix of both! And her damage is always revelant because her Q in human form does Max Percent health damage and her Q in Spider form is an execute. I can go on and on! The only problems I have with her is her mana sustain in the jungle at early levels. Its a bit of a pain. Thanks for reading!
{{champion:107}}
{{champion:154}}

Right now it's {{champion:154}} hands down until he gets some kind of nerf.

{{champion:421}} will always be a solid choice since she was designed from the ground up to be a great jungler.

{{champion:107}} 
> [{quoted}](name=Holy Wobbles,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wwkiuUZQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-30T16:26:48.033+0000)
>
> ANY SUGGESTION ABOUT BEST CHAMP IN 6300P,WHICH CAN ONE SHOT AND DO JUNGLING?
>               PLZ... SUGGEST RENGAR!!!
you should look through the champs classified as assassins then.

{{champion:154}} {{champion:32}} 

Build pure AP. Watch people disappear.
Zac, Vi, and Elise are my personal favorites/safe picks. Elise might take a while to master if you don't often use her.

Zac doesn't really have burst unless you go AP, and at that point, he's so squishy he can't really live long enough for his intended purpose which is moreso his incredible CC potential.
Elise is fairly difficult to be honest.
Vi is fairly strong, but it's not instant burst, which is why I didn't list it.
YUP I NEED LIKE LOCK AND KILL
If you want the kill then you should probably get assassins like Rengar or Khazix.
I ALREADY MASTERED RENGAR....
NEED SOME TWIST........
In that case I recommend Elise. She's very unique but you're gonna have to practice her a lot.
ANY ADC JUNGLER U CAN SUGGEST?

Kindred and Twitch are the two main ones.

Graves is some unholy disgusting abomination.
And Kayle is just Kayle.
CAN I GO KINDRED?............

Sure, but they are fairly difficult to learn and play and do well on.
I'd suggest picking someone easier to learn first.
I LIKE HARD WORK!!!! HEHE..........
MAN...... HE IS JUST AN INSECT!!!!

It's not all about burst though. These are my personal picks because their kits (in my opinion) are just good for ganking. I'm not the type of jungler who wants the kill for every gank. I just want the kill to be secured.

Yeah but this guy is asking for burst junglers, hence my response.
*shrug*

People think burst looks cool, might as well let them enjoy it till they learn more.
Hmm I didn't notice that. But I did say they're my *personal* favorites. And they do have potential burst. Just not the best for one shots
{{champion:10}}
CAN I GO KINDRED?????

{{champion:154}} {{champion:121}} these are 2 of the top tier junglers, and cost 6300 IP.
Next patch, Ivern will be released for 7800 IP (His cost will go down to 6300 after a week)
WOW.......... THATS AWESOME!!!!!!!!!
